properties.areaDesc: Jefferson, AL; Walker, AL; Tuscaloosa, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 11 at 9:51AM CST until February 13 at 3:36AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the Locust Fork At Sayre...
...The flood warning continues for the Black Warrior River At Holt
Lock and Dam...Oliver Lock and Dam...and Selden Lock and Dam...

.Heavy rainfall during the past 24 hours continues to produce rises
and flooding along the Black Warrior River basin...a flood warning
remains in effect for the Black Warrior River at Holt Lock and Dam,
Selden Lock and Dam, Oliver Lock and Dam, and the Locust Fork at Sayre.
Moderate flooding is forecast to occur at Selden Lock and Dam which may
lead to residential flooding in the surrounding area.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Locust Fork At Sayre.
* until late Wednesday night...or until the Warning is cancelled.
* AT  9:00 AM Tuesday the stage was 24.5 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 25 feet.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by late this morning and continue
to rise to near 27.3 feet by after midnight tonight . The river
will fall below flood stage by tomorrow afternoon .
* Impact...At 25 feet...Flooding of low lying wood lands and
agricultural lands along the Locust Fork occurs.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Wednesday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
